location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Jacob, Jacobabad to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Jacob's concerns over the state of the Indian Army and comparing it to how the Scinde Irregular Horse is run.The letter also informs Pelly that he has given one of Pelly's saddles to Lieutenant George William Macauley, and informing him how his horses are doing.The letter refers to an enclosed letter from Malcolm Green to Jacob, which is no longer with this letter.
